title: 486-A
statement: A. Calculating Functiontime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutFor a positive integernlet's define a functionf:f(n) =  - 1 + 2 - 3 + .. + ( - 1)nnYour task is to calculatef(n)for a given integern.InputThe single line contains the positive integern(1 ≤n≤ 1015).OutputPrintf(n)in a single line.ExamplesInput4Output2Input5Output-3Notef(4) =  - 1 + 2 - 3 + 4 = 2f(5) =  - 1 + 2 - 3 + 4 - 5 =  - 3
